title: OpenTelemetry eBPF Instrumentation Helm Chart
description: Values schema for the OpenTelemetry eBPF Instrumentation Helm chart. This chart deploys eBPF-based instrumentation to automatically collect and transmit telemetry from containerized applications without code modification.

image.title: Container Image Configuration
image.description: Configuration for the eBPF instrumentation container image

repository.title: Image Repository
repository.description: Container image repository name. Can include organization/path components depending on the registry.

tag.title: Image Tag
tag.description: Container image tag. When empty, the Chart's appVersion is used.

digest.title: Image Digest
digest.description: Container image SHA256 digest (either in format 'sha256:XYZ' or 'XYZ'). When set, will override image.tag for guaranteed reproducible deployments.

pullPolicy.title: Image Pull Policy
pullPolicy.description: Image pull policy for the container

pullSecrets.title: Image Pull Secrets
pullSecrets.description: Optional set of image pull secrets for private registries

annotations.title: DaemonSet Annotations
annotations.description: Annotations to add to the DaemonSet and related resources (ConfigMap, ClusterRole, ClusterRoleBinding)

initContainers.title: Init Containers
initContainers.description: Additional init containers to run before the main eBPF instrumentation container. Useful for setup tasks, downloading configuration files, or other initialization logic

nameOverride.title: Name Override
nameOverride.description: Overrides the chart name for resource naming

fullnameOverride.title: Full Name Override
fullnameOverride.description: Overrides the full chart name for resource naming

rbac.title: RBAC Configuration
rbac.description: Role-Based Access Control settings for the instrumentation

create.title: Create RBAC Resources
create.description: Whether to create RBAC resources (ClusterRole and ClusterRoleBinding)

extraClusterRoleRules.title: Extra Cluster Role Rules
extraClusterRoleRules.description: Extra cluster roles to be created for OpenTelemetry eBPF Instrumentation

serviceAccount.title: Service Account Configuration
serviceAccount.description: Kubernetes service account settings for the instrumentation pods

create.title: Create Service Account
create.description: Whether to create a Kubernetes service account

automount.title: Automount Service Account Credentials
automount.description: Automatically mount a ServiceAccount's API credentials

annotations.title: Service Account Annotations
annotations.description: Annotations to add to the service account

name.title: Service Account Name
name.description: The name of the service account to use. If not set and create is true, a name is auto-generated.

podAnnotations.title: Pod Annotations
podAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to the OBI pods

podLabels.title: Pod Labels
podLabels.description: Adds custom labels to the OBI Pods

podSecurityContext.title: Pod Security Context
podSecurityContext.description: Security context settings for the entire pod

privileged.title: Privileged Mode
privileged.description: If set to false, deploys an unprivileged / less privileged setup

extraCapabilities.title: Extra Capabilities
extraCapabilities.description: Extra capabilities for unprivileged / less privileged setup

securityContext.title: Container Security Context
securityContext.description: Security context settings for the instrumentation container when running in privileged mode

priorityClassName.title: Priority Class Name
priorityClassName.description: Priority class name for the pods

service.title: Service Configuration
service.description: Configuration for exposing metrics via Kubernetes Service

enabled.title: Enable Service
enabled.description: Whether to create a Service resource for the instrumentation

clusterIP.title: Cluster IP
clusterIP.description: Cluster IP address for the service

targetPort.title: Target Port
targetPort.description: Target port for the service. Defaults to prometheus_export.port from configuration.

portName.title: Port Name
portName.description: Name of the port for Prometheus metrics

appProtocol.title: App Protocol
appProtocol.description: App protocol field for the service port (e.g., 'http' or 'tcp')

nodePort.title: Node Port
nodePort.description: Static node port for the service when type is NodePort. Valid port range is 30000-32767. Leave empty for automatic assignment

externalIPs.title: External IPs
externalIPs.description: List of external IP addresses that are assigned to the service. Kubernetes will forward traffic to these IPs to the service

externalTrafficPolicy.title: External Traffic Policy
externalTrafficPolicy.description: Specifies how the service routes traffic from external sources. Set to 'Local' to preserve client source IP, or 'Cluster' (default) to allow any endpoint

internalMetrics.title: Internal Metrics Configuration
internalMetrics.description: Configuration for exposing internal instrumentation metrics

enabled.title: Enable Internal Metrics Service
enabled.description: Whether to expose internal metrics from the service

targetPort.title: Internal Metrics Target Port
targetPort.description: Target port for internal metrics. Defaults to internal_metrics.prometheus.port from configuration.

portName.title: Internal Metrics Port Name
portName.description: Name of the port for internal metrics

appProtocol.title: Internal Metrics App Protocol
appProtocol.description: App protocol field for internal metrics port

nodePort.title: Internal Metrics Node Port
nodePort.description: Static node port for internal metrics when service type is NodePort. Valid port range is 30000-32767. Leave empty for automatic assignment

k8sCache.title: Kubernetes Metadata Cache Configuration
k8sCache.description: Settings for the optional Kubernetes metadata cache deployment that helps the instrumentation enrich telemetry with cluster metadata

replicas.title: Cache Replicas
replicas.description: Number of replicas for the Kubernetes metadata cache. Set to 0 to disable the cache.

profilePort.title: Profile Port
profilePort.description: Enables the profile port for the eBPF Instrumentation cache

image.title: Cache Image Configuration
image.description: Container image settings for the Kubernetes metadata cache

registry.title: Cache Image Registry
registry.description: Registry for the cache container image.

repository.title: Cache Image Repository
repository.description: Repository name for the cache container image. Can include organization/path components depending on the registry.

tag.title: Cache Image Tag
tag.description: Tag for the cache container image. When empty, the Chart's appVersion is used.

digest.title: Cache Image Digest
digest.description: Cache image SHA256 digest (either in format 'sha256:XYZ' or 'XYZ'). When set, will override the image tag for guaranteed reproducible deployments.

pullSecrets.title: Cache Image Pull Secrets
pullSecrets.description: Optional set of image pull secrets for the cache

env.title: Cache Environment Variables
env.description: Environment variables that will override cache configmap values

envValueFrom.title: Cache Environment Variables from Resources
envValueFrom.description: Environment variables to be set from resources such as ConfigMaps or Secrets

resources.title: Cache Resource Requests and Limits
resources.description: CPU and memory resource requests and limits for the cache container

requests.title: Resource Requests
requests.description: Minimum resources required by the cache container

limits.title: Resource Limits
limits.description: Maximum resources allowed for the cache container

service.title: Cache Service Configuration
service.description: Service settings for the Kubernetes metadata cache

name.title: Service Name
name.description: Name of both the Service and Deployment

port.title: Cache Service Port
port.description: Port on which the cache service listens

internalMetrics.title: Cache Internal Metrics Configuration
internalMetrics.description: Configuration for cache internal metrics exposure

port.title: Cache Internal Metrics Port
port.description: Port for exposing cache internal metrics. A value of 0 disables internal metrics

path.title: Internal Metrics Path
path.description: Path for cache internal metrics endpoint

portName.title: Internal Metrics Port Name
portName.description: Port name for cache internal metrics

podAnnotations.title: Cache Pod Annotations
podAnnotations.description: Adds custom annotations to the eBPF Instrumentation Kube Cache Pods

podLabels.title: Cache Pod Labels
podLabels.description: Adds custom labels to the eBPF Instrumentation Kube Cache Pods

config.title: eBPF Instrumentation Configuration
config.description: Configuration object passed to the eBPF instrumentation agent, including receivers, processors, and exporters

skipConfigMapCheck.title: Skip ConfigMap Check
skipConfigMapCheck.description: Set to true to skip the check around ConfigMap creation

create.title: Create ConfigMap
create.description: Set to true to use the default configurations

name.title: ConfigMap Name
name.description: Name of an external ConfigMap containing the eBPF Instrumentation configuration

data.title: Configuration Data
data.description: Default OpenTelemetry eBPF Instrumentation configuration data. User-provided values will be merged with these defaults. The configuration includes settings for telemetry export endpoints, attributes, filters, Prometheus metrics, and other instrumentation options.

preset.title: Instrumentation Preset
preset.description: Preconfigures some default properties for network or application observability

env.title: Environment Variables
env.description: Environment variables that will override configmap values. Keys are environment variable names, values are strings.

envValueFrom.title: Environment Variables from Resources
envValueFrom.description: Environment variables to be set from resources such as Kubernetes ConfigMaps or Secrets

resources.title: Container Resource Requests and Limits
resources.description: CPU and memory resource requests and limits for the instrumentation container

requests.title: Resource Requests
requests.description: Minimum resources required by the container

limits.title: Resource Limits
limits.description: Maximum resources allowed for the container

type.title: Update Strategy Type
type.description: Update strategy type for the DaemonSet. 'RollingUpdate' gradually replaces old pods with new ones, while 'OnDelete' only updates pods when they are manually deleted.

volumes.title: Additional Volumes
volumes.description: Additional volumes on the output DaemonSet definition

volumeMounts.title: Additional Volume Mounts
volumeMounts.description: Additional volume mounts on the output DaemonSet definition

nodeSelector.title: Node Selector
nodeSelector.description: Node labels for pod scheduling constraints

tolerations.title: Pod Tolerations
tolerations.description: Tolerations for pod scheduling on tainted nodes

affinity.title: Pod Affinity Rules
affinity.description: Affinity rules for pod scheduling preferences

dnsPolicy.title: DNS Policy
dnsPolicy.description: Determines how DNS resolution is handled for that pod. If preset is 'network' or config.data.network is enabled, eBPF Instrumentation requires hostNetwork access.

serviceMonitor.title: ServiceMonitor Configuration
serviceMonitor.description: Configuration for Prometheus Operator ServiceMonitor to enable automatic metrics scraping

enabled.title: Enable ServiceMonitor
enabled.description: Whether to create a ServiceMonitor resource for Prometheus integration

additionalLabels.title: Additional Labels
additionalLabels.description: Add custom labels to the ServiceMonitor resource

endpoint.title: Metrics Endpoint
endpoint.description: ServiceMonitor Prometheus scraping endpoint configuration. Supports interval, timeout, scrapeTimeout, and other ServiceMonitor endpoint fields

endpoint.title: Internal Metrics Endpoint
endpoint.description: ServiceMonitor internal metrics scraping endpoint configuration. Supports interval, timeout, scrapeTimeout, and other ServiceMonitor endpoint fields

jobLabel.title: Prometheus Job Label
jobLabel.description: Prometheus job label. If empty, chart release name is used
